title: AI Developer
summary:
MCA graduate with hands-on experience in JSP,Servlets, Python, and MySQL. Built scalable web applications like a rolebased job portal with ATS integration. Committed to developing efficient backend systems and learning from real-world
projects.

items.name: CypherStack
